name: Typing Healer
description:
Prototype inspired by Typing of the Dead. Type the words or press the arrow key inputs  when highlighted by the box. 

Assets used:

Sprites - https://fatalaigaming.itch.io/, https://cazwolf.itch.io/caz-pixel-keyboard

Background - https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic

Music - https://opengameart.org/content/generic-8-bit-jrpg-soundtrack
